GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.18.4
GSD.description:
vduse: Fix NULL pointer dereference on sysfs access

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.18.4 by commit b22fdee17ec62604060fb0fda5e1414b634666e1, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit c8a6153b6c59d95c0e091f053f6f180952ade91e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: vduse: Fix NULL pointer dereference on sysfs access
